tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very pleasant experience with Dr.Hiral Shah and her staff. My Son was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but She was very patient with him and the staff was very helpful and kind. Dr.Hiral Shah is very professional and reasonably priced. She takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids. I feel I received honest advice and trusted my dentist's opinion here. I am so glad I chose Hello!Tooth and would highly recommend to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Greetings Dr. Hiral,
I had complete set of crowded and malalinged teeth, but dr. Hiral shah did and excellent job on getting me perfect teeth set. Her pre- braces myofunctional treatment worked wonders for me, followed by braces..got perfect straight teeth.üòä

*** ********* *** *** **** *** all the doctors are understanding and soft spoken.They listen to all our problems and take nescessary steps. There are no complaints in the treatment time and i was completely reliable on the doctor. 

Thank you dr. For all your help in giving perfect teeth.ü§ó
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. It was pleasure treating you Hemit üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My son is very stubborn and he won't follow any instructions given to him by any doctor however Dr Hiral made him comfortable n kept talking to him n made him understand about what she was doing. She also played his favourite cartoon on the screen so he feels like home.  To my surprise my son was actually listening to her, understanding her as well as cooperating.
As a parent she gave me a peace of mind with all the possible explanation for my questions and her treatment procedure. 
I would love to visit her again.... would always recommend her.

Keep up the good work... kudos.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Meet is an amazing kidüòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Hiral is a good friend of my son .Very few Drs are good in counseling and patient friendly Dr Hiral is amongst them, who has created her name by mouth publicity. Dr is such hardworking and always available incase of emergency. Thank you Dr Hiral for all support and so caring, loving.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr hiral is very approachable and friendly. She establishes good rapport with her patients and their parents. 

Taking appointments is easy and the process is handled well. So no unnecessary waiting. And if you need to wait, the waiting room is pleasant has toys to keep the kids occupied. 

She was very clear with the treatment plan for present as well as prevention for the future. 
 
Overall a wonderful pediatric dentist!
reply_text: Thank you so much. Navya is an incredibly cute kid. Love

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The charges and treatment was changed when my child was on table for it. There was no option to go back and think about the treatment as anethesia was given. There was no way to think about the charges too as there was no time. If the probability of extra bits was explained in advance, we would have been ready.
reply_text: Hi !! Greetings from Hello Tooth!! We got your feedback and we have checked the same in detail to identify the issue..First of all we at Hello Tooth always ensure that our patients are treated with utmost care and parents also should be satisfied which is the philosophy at our clinic..As we read your feedback we would like to inform you that doctor herself always explain treatment / cost factor before any treatment starts so that there is no ambiguity later which normally every parent has for their own kid..We checked our records where we always take undertaking of kids parent/ guardian where entire treatment and cost is also mentioned including anaesthesia as well..You also mentioned about local anaesthesia which is normal and it was not emergency case and you could have changed your decision at any point of time in case if you felt. However as mentioned we follow our protocols clearly to ensure all parents are satisfied but however we  would request you to get in touch with Doctor at any point of time to have more clarity on your query and we assure you once again that at Hello Tooth we are very clear and transparent in terms of treatment as well as charges.
